  • Method Details

    • createCourse

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=POST) public courseModel createCourse(@RequestBody courseModel course)
      add a new course to the database body needs to look like : { "courseId":1, "name":"fluid dynamics and microbiology applied to ethics", "teacher":"Dr fun", "ue":"ethics101", "year:1 }
      Parameters:
      course - new course
      Returns:
      the new course

    • readCourses

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=GET) public List<courseModel> readCourses()
      Read all the courses in the database
      Returns:
      all the courses

    • readCourseById

      @RequestMapping(value="/{courseId}", method=GET) public Optional<courseModel> readCourseById(@PathVariable("courseId") Long id)
      read a course by its id
      Parameters:
      id - id of the course to be read
      Returns:
      the course linked to the provided id

    • updateCourses

      @RequestMapping(value="/{courseId}", method=PUT) public courseModel updateCourses(@PathVariable("courseId") Long id, @RequestBody courseModel courseDetails)
      update a course which already exists body needs to look like : { "courseId":1, "name":"fluid dynamics and microbiology applied to ethics", "teacher":"Dr fun", "ue":"ethics101", "year:1 }
      Parameters:
      id - id of the course to be updated
      courseDetails - new course data
      Returns:
      the updated course

    • deleteCourse

      @RequestMapping(value="/{courseId}", method=DELETE) public void deleteCourse(@PathVariable("courseId") Long id)
      delete a course
      Parameters:
      id - id of the course to be deleted

    • getCoursesByUE

      @RequestMapping(value="/UE/{ue}", method=GET) public List<courseModel> getCoursesByUE(@PathVariable("ue") String ue)
      read all the course in an ue
      Parameters:
      ue - ue for which you wish to find the courses
      Returns:
      list of courses linked to the provided ue

    • getCoursesByAcademicYear

      @RequestMapping(value="/Year/{year}", method=GET) public List<courseModel> getCoursesByAcademicYear(@PathVariable("year") int year)
      read all the course in an academic year
      Parameters:
      year - academic year for which you wish to find the courses
      Returns:
      list of courses linked to the provided year
